body:
Comment 10 by **Mikhail.Kupchik**: 
Would go command support c/cgo/assembler modules? I want to be in control of the whole
toolchain, from assembler through C to golang, not only in control of golang. Entire
idea of this makefile replacement seems incomplete.

Also, this "// +build ignore" thing is very counterintuitive. Main module should be
ignored during the build or whatever?

For now, we'll stick with bitpatch of string literal inside 8g.exe.
